brainly_data.question: The​ life, in​ years, of a certain type of electrical switch has an exponential distribution with an average life betaequals3. if 300 of these switches are installed in different​ systems, what is the probability that at most 70 fail during the first​ year?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: The​ life, in​ years, of a certain type of electrical switch has an exponential distribution with an average life betaequals3. if 300 of these switches are installed in different​ systems, what is the probability that at most 70 fail during the first​ year?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
7o8Mean is 38.5
median is 31.5 
mode is 45
range is 60
